weka.classifiers.meta

Class FilteredClassifierUpdateable

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • weka.classifiers.meta.FilteredClassifier
          • weka.classifiers.meta.FilteredClassifierUpdateable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Classifier, IterativeClassifier, UpdateableBatchProcessor, UpdateableClassifier, BatchPredictor, CapabilitiesHandler, CapabilitiesIgnorer, Drawable, OptionHandler, PartitionGenerator, RevisionHandler

    public class FilteredClassifierUpdateable
extends FilteredClassifier
implements UpdateableClassifier, UpdateableBatchProcessor
    Class for running an arbitrary classifier on data that has been passed through an arbitrary filter. Like the classifier, the structure of the filter is based exclusively on the training data and test instances will be processed by the filter without changing their structure.
    Incremental version: only takes incremental classifiers as base classifiers (i.e., they have to implement the weka.classifiers.UpdateableClassifier interface).

    Valid options are: 

     -F <filter specification>
  Full class name of filter to use, followed
  by filter options.
  eg: "weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.Remove -V -R 1,2"
 
     -D
  If set, classifier is run in debug mode and
  may output additional info to the console
 
     -W
  Full name of base classifier.
  (default: weka.classifiers.bayes.NaiveBayesUpdateable)
 
     Options specific to classifier weka.classifiers.bayes.NaiveBayesUpdateable:
 
     -K
  Use kernel density estimator rather than normal
  distribution for numeric attributes
 
     -D
  Use supervised discretization to process numeric attributes
 
     -O
  Display model in old format (good when there are many classes)
    Version:
    $Revision: 11099 $
    Author:
    fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    UpdateableClassifier, Serialized Form
